text: What does the term real-time mean?
skills: Understand Unity’s history and role within the industries that rely on real-time creation.

options.text: How quickly a complex scene - including lights, effects, materials and physics - is rendered on the screen.
Waiting a long time to render complex scenes.

feedbackIncorrect: The term real-time describes how quickly an image is rendered (or displayed) on the screen. Eliminating the need to wait for renders has changed the ways creators can work — in fact, creators who move their projects from offline rendering to real-time remove weeks or months from the production cycle, and give themselves more time to experiment with new ideas or polish what’s already been designed.
